title: Rav Yosef Rebukes Shas Party
body: Rav Yitzchok Yosef, former Sephardic Chief Rabbi of Israel, sharply criticized the Shas Party and the Religious Affairs Ministry for allegedly refusing to fund the Maran Heritage Center, a project he supports.

title: Lakewood Unites Behind Ciattarelli
body: Lakewood community leaders, including Rabbi, urge residents to vote for gubernatorial candidate Jack Ciattarelli and local GOP candidates in a joint "Voting in Unity – כאיש אחד" effort.
